name: Keep Your Litter, Beach!
description:
All that litter and poop! Where should we leave it? In the ocean? On the beach?

Challenge a nearby friend or family member for a fun game of poo...ng. 

Make tactical choices of letting certain items through, whacking them back at the other player, or taking the hit. 

Win by scoring highest (or not lowest)!

Have fun saving your side from poop and plastic! :-)

Made by Alan & Fenny
